About.Access: Open by appointment; closed weekends and public holidays. Reference assistance available in person and by telephone. No copying services available.

About.Acquisition focus: Minimum age 17 years. One month's advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required. Access is determined by application.

About.Quantity: Administrative records relating to the physical development of the Gold Coast City. (100% in-house).

About.Major holdings: Town of Coolangatta: Records 1924-1949 (12m). Town of Southport: Records 1939-1949 (25m). Shire of Nerang: Records 1911-1949 (3m). Shire of Southport: Records 1886-1911 (3m). City of Gold Coast: Records 1949- (300m).

Contact.Postal address: PO Box 5042, Gold Coast Mail Centre 4217
